text: Karolina Kaczorowska (born name: Karolina Mariampolska; 26 September 1930 – 21 August 2021) was a Polish academic. She was the widow of Ryszard Kaczorowski, the last President of Poland in exile. She was the First Lady from 1989 until 1990. Kaczorowska was born in Stanisławów, Poland. Kaczorowska in London on 21 August 2021 at the age of 90.Nie żyje Karolina Kaczorowska, wdowa po ostatnim prezydencie RP na uchodźstwie ==References== Category:1930 births Category:2021 deaths Category:First Ladies of Poland Category:Polish academics
title: Karolina Kaczorowska
